title: Best sudoku app
comment: No ads, doesn't require permissions, clean and intuitive interface, lots of handy options for all types of players, lots of different types of puzzles and excellent difficulty scaling!

title: Best in its category
comment: No special permissions required. Multiple varieties of sudokos. Stable. Also recently updated.

title: voted 5 because cow
comment: You just can't argue with that.

title: Free samurai sudoku
comment: Only app I can find that offers free samurai sudoku.  It may not have pretty graphics and easy UI, but it's a sudoku game....and it's free.

title: Not challenging enough
comment: Even on infernal mode the samurai sudoku isnt hard enough, needs to be more challenging...

title: Doesn't need crazy permissions.
comment: Makes it tons better than the competition!

title: Love it!
comment: I just got it and don't want to sleep. Love the Samurai puzzles. All five!!

title: One complaint... maybe more...
comment: I have one major complaint... the generated puzzles are not symmetrical. I notice that a number of Sudoku apps ignore this restriction. If SudoQ could include the option to turn on symmetry, vertical, horizontal, both, it would be a much better program.  Update: As I work with the app, I have problems switching to gesture mode. And the instructions on the use of the app's menu are poor. Nice try.  But don't waste your time with this app.

title: Can't see grid
comment: I can't see the samurai grids on my galaxy mini, its really not rocket science to add a zoom function, plus its extremely easy

title: Totally awesometacular!!!
comment: This is quite possibly the best sudoku app I have ever used. I would love it if a future update includes 25x25 puzzles. I'm addicted to the 16x16 puzzles.  Edit: I don't know what Martina is talking about. Perhaps I don't have mine set up the she had hers.

title: Best sudoku app
comment: Great variety of puzzle formats, 4 skill levels, challenging and very addictive.  My fav is samurai sudoku.

title: Easy
comment: I liked the concept but it is too easy even on 'difficult'-

title: way to easy puzzles
comment: Even on the hardest difficulty setting you can just keep filling in the only possible number without ever having to think

title: Samurai!
comment: I've been looking for samurai sudoku for a long time.
